about_the_game: This demo offers a sneak peek into Math4TopDogs. Play through the first levels of the 3 worlds and discover the core gameplay mechanics. We look forward to your feedback!
detailed_description: This demo offers a sneak peek into Math4TopDogs. Play through the first levels of the 3 worlds and discover the core gameplay mechanics. We look forward to your feedback!
legal_notice: © 2025 Mathsandcau. All rights reserved. Math4TopDogs is a trademark of Mathsandcau.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel, Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Math4TopDogs Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This demo offers a sneak peek into Math4TopDogs. Play through the first levels of the 3 worlds. Local 1v1 gameplay is even available.
